DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect adaptative Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy ( IMRT ) treatment locally advanced cervical cancer acute genito-urinary ( GU ) , gastrointestinal ( GI ) toxicity . Every patient treat accord adaptative IMRT strategy .
DOC.brief_title: Adaptative Radiotherapy Locally Advanced Cervical Cancer
DOC.criteria: Cervix carcinoma prove histology According International Federation Gynecology Obstetrics ( FIGO ) classification , stage IB2 , IIA , IIB , IIIA IIIB without lumboaortic lymph node damage ( surgical radiologic ) Patient treat radiochemotherapy curietherapy curative aim , validate multidisciplinary meeting Renal , hepatic cardiovascular function allow administration associate systemic treatment Older 18 year Good general status , World Health Organization less equal 1 Signed informed consent History cancer control / treat less 5 year ( except cutaneous basocellular cancer ) History pelvic irradiation Simultaneous participation another research could interfere study result Pregnant breastfeeding patient Patient tutor guardian Patient able respect medical followup geographical , social psychological reason Not affiliated system French social security
